department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 介紹電磁波在均向介質及電漿中的傳播特性以及傳輸線之理論及應用.
goal.en: “Introduction to the general properties of electromagnetic waves propagation in the isotropic media and in the plasma, and the theory and applications of the transmission line.“

outline.ch:
“1.線性分析
2.電磁學之基本方程式
3.平面波的一些基本特性
4.在均向介質中之平面波
5.在電漿中之平面波
6.傳輸線之理論及應用“
outline.en:
“1.Linear Analysis
2.Basic Equations of Electromagnetics
3.Some General Properties of Plane Waves
4.Plane Waves in Isotropic Media
5.Plane Waves in Plasma
6.Theory and Application of Transmission Line“
